description: Forget about your worries and your strife with your bear necessities close at hand. Multiple attachment options and room for bear spray, a deterrent horn, and bear bangers, this holster provides quick access to your wildlife safety kit.Nylon loops with hook-and-loop closure to fit belts or backpacks.Fits most 225g bear spray canisters (canister not included).Side slots hold Tru Flare Bearbangers and Pen Launcher.Side pocket fits horn or extra bear bangers.
name: Kodiak Bear Necessities Holster 225g
